skill.description: Pedantic Diversio backend dev workflow Skill that enforces ClickUp-linked branch/PR naming, PR hygiene, safe Django migrations, and downtime-safe schema changes for Django4Lyfe-style backends.

skill.author: DiversioTeam

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only SKILL.md. No executable code, scripts, or network calls. Uses only standard Read, Bash, Glob, and Grep tools as permitted by the AI environment.

content.value_statement: Backend pull requests often miss critical workflow steps like proper ClickUp ticket linkage, migration safety checks, or downtime-safe schema changes. This skill provides a pedantic checklist to catch these issues before merge and deployment.
actual_capabilities: Enforces ClickUp-linked branch naming convention clickup_<ticket_id>
Validates PR titles include ticket ID and follow project format
Reviews Django migrations for cleanup and proper structure
Checks downtime-safe schema change patterns for large tables
Validates release and hotfix branch workflows
Reviews PR descriptions for completeness and manual deployment steps
limitations: Only provides recommendations; does not modify code or branch settings
Relies on user input for branch names, PR titles, and migration details
Does not integrate directly with ClickUp API or GitHub API
Assumes Django-based backend; may not fit non-Django projects

use_cases.title: Review Django PRs
use_cases.description: Ensure PRs follow naming conventions, migration best practices, and downtime-safe deployment patterns.

use_cases.title: Standardize PR workflow
use_cases.description: Enforce consistent branch naming, ticket linkage, and release processes across the backend team.

use_cases.title: Prevent bad migrations
use_cases.description: Catch dangerous schema changes before they reach production and cause downtime.

prompt_templates.title: Quick PR review
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the backend-pr-workflow skill to review this PR. Branch: clickup_GH-1234_feature-name. Base: release. Title: [GH-1234] Add new feature.

prompt_templates.title: Pre-merge check
prompt_templates.prompt: Run backend-pr-workflow on my planned PR. Title: [GH-785] Fix login bug. Description: Fixes timeout issue. Migration: added is_active field with default True on large User table.

prompt_templates.title: Migration safety
prompt_templates.prompt: Use backend-pr-workflow to check if my Django migration plan is downtime-safe. I am adding a nullable UUID field to a table with 10 million rows, then backfilling in migration.

prompt_templates.title: Hotfix validation
prompt_templates.prompt: Use backend-pr-workflow to validate my hotfix. Target branch: master. Title: Hotfix release: 2025-08-19. This is an emergency fix for production bug.

output_examples.input: Review my Django PR. Branch: feature/my-thing. Title: Add user profile. Base: master. I added a required field with default on a large table.
output: ‚úÖ What's aligned: Title includes descriptive text

‚ö†Ô∏è [BLOCKING] PR targets 'master' but should target 'release' for normal feature work

best_practices: Always include the ClickUp ticket ID in branch name and PR title for traceability.
Use two-step migrations for adding columns to large tables: nullable first, then backfill.
Split code removal from schema removal into separate PRs to avoid deployment errors.
anti_patterns: Merging code that removes a field with the migration that drops it in the same PR.
Using volatile defaults like UUID or current_timestamp inside atomic migrations on large tables.
Reusing the same ClickUp ticket ID across multiple repositories for a single feature.

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Claude Code, OpenAI Codex, and standard Claude models. Use the installation method for your platform.

faq.question: What are the blocking issues this skill flags?
faq.answer: Missing ClickUp ticket ID in branch, wrong base branch, and schema changes that risk production downtime.

faq.question: Does this skill modify my code?
faq.answer: No. It only analyzes and provides recommendations. You must apply changes manually.

faq.question: Is my data safe with this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. It only reads PR information you provide. No data is stored or transmitted externally.

faq.question: Why are my migrations flagged as blocking?
faq.answer: Migrations adding non-nullable fields with defaults on large tables cause table locks. Use the two-step pattern recommended.

faq.question: How does this differ from standard PR reviews?
faq.answer: Focuses on workflow compliance, migration safety, and deployment patterns rather than code logic or style.
